review: If you stream content to your TV this is a must have device.  In my experience it actually shows the movies/content better than using a native app on a smart TV.  This little device allows you to turn any TV with an HDMI input into a smart TV.Apps that I use regularly:  HBO GO, Neflix, Hulu Plus, MLB.TV, Googe Play Movies, Google Photos (to show off photos on the big screen).Apps that are Missing:  AMAZON PRIME MOVIES.
author: jbecu

review: This device has basically changed my life. It's now the most used item in my home. I use it to stream Netflix, HBO, Hulu, my personal media collection, music, etc. I can even use it to watch Twitch using an app on my phone. Anyone that watches a lot of Netflix and has a smartphone should invest in one.
